ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] My source of income
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh...I m not really into selling yet.  As long as I get 1/5 of a blue bub for every four I turn in...I probably still won t.sell em (even though I ll want the
ygData.messageBody:
Heh...I'm not really into selling yet. As long as I get 1/5 of a blue bub
for every four I turn in...I probably still won't.sell em (even though I'll
want the money :>)
But the main reason I do this...Is because I have very little down time.

Oh...and a suggestion all....don't go from playing a bard to playing a
warrior.....sloooooow as anything.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [SMTP:suceress@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2001 7:06 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] My source of income
>
>
> Good thing you're not on The Tribunal bc I've been wiping out every cent
> my
> lvl 11 Bard can kill in CB. I'd hate to have to compete with you. but I'm
> not selling the belts. :-)
> luv,
> -Su

> how
